definition: to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: He became acquainted with many well-known writers during her short stay there.
sentences.chinese: 她在那短暫逗留期間結識了許多名作家。

sentences.english: She had seen the world and lived with great people and raised herself far beyond her original humble station.
sentences.chinese: 她見過了世面，結識了大人物，地位比從前高得多。

sentences.english: Conson your present happy ghost, meet a new girlfriend Annie.
sentences.chinese: 開心鬼的今世康森貴，結識了新女友安妮。

sentences.english: We are the casual acquaintance of a long railway journey.
sentences.chinese: 我們是在火車長途旅行中偶然結識的朋友。

sentences.english: What are the advantages and the disadvantages between before-school and after-school relationships?
sentences.chinese: 畢業前和畢業後結識的朋友優點和缺點是什麼？

sentences.english: He followed up with a visit to Iran the following year and then befriended Chávez.
sentences.chinese: 翌年，他又到訪伊朗，之後結識了查韋斯。

sentences.english: Golden flowers to the food factory jobs, what accidentally met the directors son.
sentences.chinese: 金花到食品廠打工還債，偶然結識了廠長的兒子楊帆。

sentences.english: And how did Buffett get to know Weschler?
sentences.chinese: 韋斯切勒是如何結識巴菲特的呢？

sentences.english: When he was travelling across Romania, he fell into company with a party of gipsies.
sentences.chinese: 他在羅馬尼亞旅行時結識了一羣吉卜賽人。

sentences.english: Our friend choices are limited by the opportunities to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我們擇友受到了能夠結識的機遇的限制。

sentences.english: I also just to xiao-he soon, but, I have met many good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我也剛來小荷不久，但是，我已經結識了許多好朋友。

sentences.english: I happened to get acquainted with the widow of some departed high Anglo-Indian official.
sentences.chinese: 我偶然結識了一個高級英裔印度官員的遺孀。

sentences.english: I will teach my exper'ience to the per'son that I should get to know.
sentences.chinese: 我要向我結識的人傳授我學英語的經驗。

sentences.english: A day night, difficult Ma Jie knew Rong Zi of woman of a gassed.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上，難馬結識了一名喝醉酒的女子榮子。

sentences.english: You can make new connections if you play your cards right.
sentences.chinese: 如果出對牌的話就能結識新朋友。

definition: to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to get to know each other/acquaintance
to form ties/to become attached (to sb, sth)
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to hold an office or post
to recommend sb/to give a referral
